TopicTitle: Podrian crear un reporte de BUGS en Español.

Articles.Content: Me he encontrado muchos bugs en el juego, la verdad mas de los que me esperaba encontrar, pero no veo ninguna seccion en Español donde pueda compartirlos.

I would imagine that, if you use the Private Division launcher, you should be able to submit a bug in Spanish, and someone at Intercept will be able to read it. Especially with former Squad developers working there, a good chunk of the team is likely Spanish-speaking.

I know the moderators here tend to be sticklers for putting non-English posts in the International subforums, but maybe that parent forum should have its own Bug Reports subforum in that case?

It doesn't seem practical to have a different subforum for each language's bug reports. There would be a lot of redundancy and people missing potentially helpful information simply because it was in another langauge. I would advise that we all share the one sub and use internet translations. 

Quote

No parece práctico tener un subforo diferente para los informes de errores de cada idioma. Habría mucha redundancia y la gente perdería información potencialmente útil simplemente porque estaba en otro idioma. Aconsejaría que todos compartamos el sub y usemos traducciones de Internet.
